Performances > February 1991: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

February 1991: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

Plays:

The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Scenes:

Shundo Jiroemon's House (春藤次郎右衛門屋敷)

The Koriyama Hachiman Shrine (郡山八幡)

The Daianji River Bank (大安寺堤)

Characters:

Shundo Sukedayu (春藤助太夫)

Sahei, Suketayu's servant (若党佐兵衛)

Dempachi, a broker (熊手の伝八)

Rokuroemon Sudo (須藤六郎右衛門)

Jinroku Hikosaka (彦坂甚六)

Oteru, a dancing girl (舞子おてる)

Katsuno, a dancing girl (舞子かつの)

Ikuyo, a dancing girl (舞子いく世)

Suketaro Shundo (春藤助太郎)

Shinshichi Shundo (春藤新七)

Page (小坊主)

Oshimo, Rokuroemon's sister (須藤妹お霜)

Oyana, a cook (賄おやな)

Okatsu, a housewife (女房おかつ)

Otsuya, a housewife (女房おつや)

Jiroemon Shundo (春藤次郎右衛門)

Oharu, Jiroemon's wife (妻お春)

Sukedayu's wife (助太夫妻)

Ihei, a servant (若党伊兵衛)

Oshimo's mother (須藤母)

Udaemon (Utaemon) Kamura (加村宇田右衛門)

Yoroku (与六)

Buemon Takaichi (高市武右衛門)

Shonosuke, Buemon's son (伜庄之助)

Samurai (修行者)
